" Auto sales seen losing momentum in January U.S. auto sales lost momentum in the final weeks of January, auto executives and a leading analyst cautioned on Monday... J.D. Power forecast a January sales rate of between 11.5 million and 12 million vehicles, down sharply from the outlook for 12.2 million it had given just 10 days before. ... on Monday Chrysler Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne said that industry-wide sales had fallen off in the final weeks of the month, which typically account for the bulk of sales. Former Secretary of State Colin Powell said Sunday that it was too early to say whether troops should begin to withdraw from Afghanistan in June as scheduled. I can't answer that, and I don't think anyone else can, Colin Powell said on CNN's`` State of the Union.'' issues linked to the Middle East peace process can only be resolved by the two parties negotiating directly with each other,'' Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., wrote in a letter signed by 16 of her colleagues. Attempts to use a venue such as the United Nations, which you know has a long history of hostility toward Israel, to deal with just one issue in the negotiations, will not move the two sides closer to a two-state solution, but rather damage the fragile trust between them, she wrote.

Howard Stern to David Letterman : sorry about your sex scandal( video) Instead of deflecting Howard Stern 's apology, David Letterman responded with candor and a bit of reciprocal praise. `` You have been very, very nice to me on the radio and viciously ugly to me on the radio and I except both with equanimity because I know a little bit about how you operate and I'm still fond of your talent and your ability and what you've represented to the United States of America-and of course, the world. " Howard Stern calls for Hollywood to boycott Jay Leno ( video) Howard Stern ended his third and final segment on Thursday night's Late Show once again pushing for David Letterman to holler back at him
